item.title: TidyTuesday Contributions - Overview
item.description: TidyTuesday is a weekly social data project. It provides interesting data regularly and invites you to engage with it. I participate regularly, using Python and Jupyter Notebook, to test out new data science techniques, libraries or plots. All my analyses and visualizations of TidyTuesday datasets are posted here - code and results. The topic range is huge, from climate data to mountain climbers. Link to GitHub Repository Global Surface Temperature Link to GitHub Repository
